price: ߤߋ߯ ߸ ߌ ߓߊ߯ ߦߋ߲߬ ߦߋ߫ ߌ ߘߌ߫ ߣߍߡߊ ߣߌ߫ ߡߊ߲߬ߛߊ߬ߦߊ߫ ߓߟߋ߬ߓߟߋ ߦߋ߫ ( ߞߏ ߓߍ߯ ߘߐ߫ )
arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَيۡتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيۡتَ نَعِيمٗا وَمُلۡكٗا كَبِيرًا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā ra-ayta thamma ra-ayta naʿīman wamul'kan kabīran
